title: Lunchbox Returned A Lost Wallet…Did He Get A Reward? + Bobby Asks Bethenny Frankel About People Faking Wealth + George Birge On Going Viral on TikTok!
itunes:title: Lunchbox Returned A Lost Wallet…Did He Get A Reward? + Bobby Asks Bethenny Frankel About People Faking Wealth + George Birge On Going Viral on TikTok!
description:
Lunchbox tells us how he found a wallet at the part and was able to find the person’s house of who it belonged to. He brings us the audio of him returning it and has us guess whether or not he got a reward. We talk to Bethenny Frankel about her new HBO Max Show, Real Housewives and Amy asks her a very personal question. Bobby talks to George Birge who just had a song go viral after someone made a video making fun of today’s country music. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
